# nsrr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of nsrr is to allow users to access data from the National Sleep Research Resource ('NSRR') (https://sleepdata.org/).

## Installation

You can install the released version of nsrr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("nsrr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(nsrr)
df = nsrr_datasets()
DT::datatable(df)
```
